Brief description of the task

Any technical implementation details, constraints, or considerations

- `path/to/file1.ts`
- `path/to/file2.tsx`

- [ ] Unit tests required

- Depends on: #[issue_number]
- Blocks: #[issue_number]

- [ ] Code written and tested
